description: Ministry of Labour & Labour Relations - Revocation of Order Published in Gaz. Ex. No. 1657/4 of 07.06.2010 - Appointed Mrs. N. A. Jayawickrama as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. A. P. P. D. Indrasekara and Sri Lanka Transport Board - Appointed Mr. S. Liyanage as Arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. M. W. S. Keerthinama & Sri Lanka Transport Board - Revocation of Order dated 09.09.2011 - Appointed Mr. K. M. Sarathchandra as arbitrator for settle the dispute between retired employees including Mrs. S. Wijesuriya and Cey. Petroleum Co-operation and Cey. Petroleum Storage terminals Ltd.
